persona.name: Samantha
persona.bio: Samantha is a 34-year-old marketing professional who likes to stay updated on global events during her morning coffee. She’s not very technical, prefers simple navigation, and usually looks for trending or top news stories without wanting to dig too deep. Samantha values speed, clarity, and a straightforward path to headlines.
